long_description: Made for all-around use, the Black Diamond Light D carabiner is perfect when size and weight are a concern. D-shape directs most forces along the spine of the biner rather than the weaker gate-side. Made of cold-forged aluminum alloy for light weight, performance and superior strength. Raised gate latch allows you to identify the working end of the biner by just a touch.
short_description: Made for all-around use, the Black Diamond Light D carabiner is perfect when size and weight are a concern.
